TopicTitle: KSP krashes every now and then

Articles.Content:
Hi, 

I hope anyone kan help me.

My KSP (with only mech jeb, alarm klock, KIS, KAS, KER installed) krashes every now and then, i dont see a pattern why, I also uninstalled the mods, and i reinstalled KSP as well, but it still krashes. I would attach the krash files here, but the forum don't let me.

Thanks,

Jin'

3 hours ago, Jin' Gej said:

I would attach the krash files here, but the forum don't let me.

You have to upload the files to a hosting site like Dropbox or Google Drive, then post the link to the files here.
